pr_title: Allow skipping tests in TestNG at runtime

timeline.message: Refactor the TestNG Transformer directory structure
Add a new annotation to skip tests in TestNG.
Use the SkipTest annotation to skip tests at runtime.
Skip NewSearchPageTest when CI is in Old UI.
Remove the skipping test workaround added in NewSearchPageTest.

timeline.bodyText: I wonder if people want to add this annotation on class level. Adding it on method level gives more flexibility though.
timeline.author: PenghaiZhang

replies.bodyText: Depends. If this class is dedicated to newUI, I'd say put it at the class level.
replies.author: edalex-ian
